required_parameters.description:
It must be one of the following:

- nfl
- nba
- nhl
- ncaam
- ncaaw
- soccer
- mlb
- tennis
- ncaaf
- sports-betting
- nascar
- rugby
- golf

Soccer League List
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://espn13.p.rapidapi.com/v1/soccer/league/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "espn13.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://espn13.p.rapidapi.com/v1/soccer/league/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "espn13.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
